title: Truth Gaming - LF Top Laner
body:
Hi there,

Truth Gaming is looking for a top laner who is willing to fulfill the roles of Mr Veniveci, who has departed with us on good terms.
We are primarily looking for a player who is willing to put in the time and effort to grow as a team, have the mindset of improving and constructing a positive team environment and a person who can play those tanks when needed :P

The team is currently playing in Summoners Society Private Ladder, and also participating in one day cups, leagues such as Cybergamer and Summoners Ladder.

Plat+ is the preference, the team consists of Plat 3+ players.
Looking to trial ASAP.

Add me in client - TG dangeR, for more questions etc.

Thanks,
dangeR

replies.body: Down to Trial if you guys are keen

Bump - still looking. 
We are looking to trial ASAP.
